title: NeXTcube Hard Drive Upgrade - Krazy Ken's Tech Misadventures
tags: NeXTcube Hard Drive Upgrade - Krazy Ken's Tech Misadventures
description: Krazy Ken's rare NeXTcube is making some WEIRD noises. The hard drive is probably about to die, so Ken works with @Mac84 to upgrade the Cube and have some fun!  Watch Steve's channelMac84   Check out our rare tech playlist   Watch the first NeXTcube episode   Download our epic wallpapers    Support our channel and get cool stuff   Follow us on Twitter   Like us on Facebook   Subscribe and listen to our podcast     Patrons get to see episodes early! They also got behind-the-scenes access, Discord VIP access, and their names in the credits! Pledge now to get those awesome perks, and help fund the future of the Computer Clan! Thanks for your support.   Here's the eBay seller. I've purchased multiple NeXT-related products from him (stock limited)    NOTE: Some of you may be wondering what's happening with the NeXT MegaPixel Displayit sometimes glows weird and pulsates a bit. It's a 67 Hz display, which makes it VERY difficult to sync with a camera shutter with a standard 30 or 24 fps frame rate. So in this case, I had to use software solutions to reduce the flicker. I know it's not perfect, but it's 10 times less annoying than the non-processed footage.  Contact Us    Get royalty-free stock footage with Artgrid. Sign up with my link to support the channel and get 2 extra months free:   I also use Artlist for the music in my videos. I highly recommend them  Click for 2 extra months free:   Get film gear Ken uses   On a lower budget?    Computer Clan is an Amazon Associate. Amazon links are powered by the Amazon Associates Program.  #KrazyKen #ComputerClan
